name: Orange Chrysanthemum Iced Tea With Peach Ice Cubes
keywords: chrysanthemum tea, orange juice, peach nectar, dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the peach nectar into an ice cube tray and freeze overnight. Whisk together the tea and orange juice. Place a few of the ice cubes in each glass and pour the tea over them. Let stand a few minutes until the cubes begin to melt. Stir, garnish with mint and serve.
